expression_library.variable: 0.1629 * exp(-0.00008 * sqrt((person.disaggregate(parcel.x_coord_sp, intermediates=[building, household])-person.disaggregate(parcel.x_coord_sp, intermediates=[building, job]))^2+(person.disaggregate(parcel.y_coord_sp, intermediates=[building, household])-person.disaggregate(parcel.y_coord_sp, intermediates=[building, job]))^2))
